name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **AWS**, specializing in high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Demonstrated proficiency in event-driven architectures and infrastructure as code, ensuring robust system performance and seamless **external systems integration**.

Skilled in Agile methodologies and effective **code reviews**, fostering collaboration and strong **communication** among cross-functional teams. Experience with **DynamoDB** for reliable data management, coupled with a passion for continuous learning and **curiosity** in emerging technologies.

Extensive background in both frontend and backend development, utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **FastAPI**, along with a solid foundation in compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven track record of implementing CI/CD pipelines and leveraging MLOps tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for AI/ML projects.

experience.responsibilities:
Delivered full-stack applications and solutions leveraging **Node.js** and **TypeScript** in an **Agile** environment, ensuring high code quality and performance through rigorous **code reviews**.
Implemented **DynamoDB** for efficient data storage and retrieval, seamlessly integrating with external systems to enhance logistics and operational workflows.
Employed **infrastructure as code** practices for scalable and maintainable deployments on **AWS**, utilizing services for automation and operational excellence.
Led the design of event-driven architectures, enabling responsive and efficient system interactions, which improved overall application performance by **30%**.
Facilitated effective **communication** and **collaboration** across cross-functional teams to drive project success and enhance productivity.
Leveraged curiosity to explore and integrate cutting-edge technologies, continuously improving the tech stack.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using industry standards, reducing deployment time by **50%** while ensuring stability across environments.
Produced detailed documentation and user guides, enhancing team onboarding and project handovers, contributing to a **25%** increase in team efficiency.
Conducted regular training sessions to promote best practices in software development and maintain a high standard of coding discipline among peers.

• Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and Python (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with React, D3.js, and Power BI Embedded, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
• Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing Redux Toolkit and Tailwind CSS to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
• Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows for payments, alerts, and compliance.
• Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using Python, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
• Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.
• Collaborated in an Agile environment, implementing **DynamoDB** for efficient data storage and retrieval, maintaining high standards through regular code reviews and effective teamwork.
• Integrated external systems, showcasing strong communication and collaboration skills to streamline logistics and enhance system interoperability.

• Developed and maintained scalable backend services using **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and **TypeScript** for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and low latency for user-facing modules with traffic handling capacity reaching over **100,000** concurrent users.
• Implemented event-driven architecture leveraging **AWS**, **Redis**, and **DynamoDB** to integrate external systems, streamlining logistics processes and enabling real-time data flow for order fulfillment and inventory management.
• Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, participating in code reviews and fostering communication and collaboration among cross-functional teams to enhance project delivery timelines by an average of **30%**.
• Engineered dynamic integrations with third-party logistics and payment systems, enhancing conversion rates by **25%** through improved checkout experiences powered by **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**.
• Authored infrastructure as code scripts using **AWS CloudFormation** to automate deployment processes, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment times across multiple environments.
• Drove continuous improvement initiatives by sharing insights and gaining knowledge about the latest **event-driven** systems and technologies, leading to enhanced project outcomes.
• Spearheaded feature development for seamless integration of logistics functionalities, maximizing operational efficiency and reducing delivery delays by **15%**.
• Cultivated a culture of curiosity and innovation within the team, encouraging experimentation and the adoption of cutting-edge solutions.
